Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Disproportionate \Dis`pro*por"tion*ate\, a. Not proportioned; unsymmetrical; unsuitable to something else in bulk, form, value, or extent; out of proportion; inadequate; as, in a perfect body none of the limbs are disproportionate; it is wisdom not to undertake a work disproportionate means. -- {Dis`pro*por"tion*ate*ly}, adv. -- {Dis`pro*por"tion*ate*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
disproportionate adj 1: out of proportion [syn: {disproportional}] [ant: {proportionate}] 2: not proportionate
